briefdescription.para: load from MAILx and models

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_LoadModels()

briefdescription.para: load from bulk_behav

detaileddescription.para: python usage : pordMAILx_LoadBehaviours()

briefdescription.para: declares to models couple (model,behav)

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_PushProperties()

briefdescription.para: Read DRV_DOF.DAT.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ReadDrivenDof()

briefdescription.para: Write DRV_DOF.OUT.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_WriteDrivenDof()

briefdescription.para: Read DOF.INI.

detaileddescription.para: If num <= 0 : DATBOX/DOF.INI file is read
Else : OUTBOX/DOF.OUT.num is read, num being the parameter used in TimeEvolution_ReadIniDof last call

python usage : poroMAILx_ReadIniDof(num=0)
num
(integer) : which DOF file to read

briefdescription.para: Read DOF file.

detaileddescription.para: If num <= 0 : DATBOX/DOF.INI file is read
Else : OUTBOX/DOF.OUT.num is read, num being the parameter used in TimeEvolution_ReadIniMecaDof last call

python usage : poroMAILx_ReadIniMecaDof(num=0)
num
(integer) : which DOF file to read

briefdescription.para: Read GPV file.

detaileddescription.para: If num <= 0 : DATBOX/GPV.INI file is read
Else : OUTBOX/GPV.OUT.num is read, num being the parameter used in TimeEvolution_ReadIniGPV last call

python usage : poroMAILx_ReadIniGPV(num=0)
num
(integer) : which GPV file to read

briefdescription.para: Read GPV file.

detaileddescription.para: If num <= 0 : DATBOX/GPV.INI file is read Else : OUTBOX/GPV.OUT.num is read, num being the parameter used in TimeEvolution_ReadIniMecaGPV last call

python usage : poroMAILx_ReadIniMecaGPV(num=0)
num
(integer) : which GPV file to read

briefdescription.para: Write ascii DOF.LAST file.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_WriteLastDof()

briefdescription.para: compute elementary mass and inertia of bodies

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeMass()

briefdescription.para: compute elementary external forces

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeFext()

briefdescription.para: compute elementary stiffness

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeBulk()

briefdescription.para: compute elemenatry damping

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeDamping()

briefdescription.para: assembles matrice

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_AssembKT()

briefdescription.para: assembles RHS

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_AssembRHS()

briefdescription.para: computes free motion (without contact contribution)

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeFreeVelocity()

briefdescription.para: computes motion (free + contact)

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeDof()

briefdescription.para: Display body degrees of freedom.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_DisplayOutDof()

briefdescription.para: update begin dof with current dof

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_UpdateDof()

briefdescription.para: update begin elementary fields with current elementary fields

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_UpdateBulk(void)

briefdescription.para: apply elementary fields gradient

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputeGrad(void)

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of a vector of a given body.

listitem.para: "Xbeg_": cumulated displacements over time at beginning of time step
"X____": cumulated displacements over time in computed configuration
"Vbeg_": velocity at beginning of time step
"VbALE": fluid velocity at beginning of time step
"V_ALE": fluid velocity at beginning of time step
"Pbeg_": pressure at beginning of time step

detaileddescription.para: Possible values for datatype field are "X____", "Xbeg_", "V____", "Vbeg_", "Vaux_", "Reac_", "Vfree", "Fext_", "Fint_"

Python usage : vector = poroMAILx_GetBodyVector(datatype, ibdyty)
datatype
(string of size 5) : the vector to get
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
vector (double 2D-array) : the desired vector

briefdescription.para: Get the number of nodes of a poroMAILx.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_nodes = poroMAILx_GetNbNodes(ibdyty)
ivalue
(integer) : id of the poroMAILx
nb_nodes (integer) : number of nodes of a poroMAILx

briefdescription.para: Get the number of elements of a poroMAILx.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_elements = poroMAILx_GetNbElements(ibdyty)
ivalue
(integer) : id of the poroMAILx
nb_nodes (integer) : number of elements of a poroMAILx

briefdescription.para: correction of the configuration parameter using the theta-method

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_IncrementStep()

briefdescription.para: skip renumbering of the unknowns using a rcc method

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_WithoutRenumbering()

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_BandStorage()

briefdescription.para: use sparse matrix

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_SparseStorage()

briefdescription.para: use element by element matrix

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ExplodedStorage()

briefdescription.para: use diagonal matrix

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_DiagonalStorage()

briefdescription.para: use skyline matrix

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_SkylineStorage()

briefdescription.para: use full matrix

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_FullStorage()

briefdescription.para: assume matrix is symmetrical

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_SymmetricShape()

briefdescription.para: does not assume any thing on matrix shape

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_UnspecifiedShape()

memberdef.argsstring: (int IdBody, int f_rank, double *rvector_in, int rlength_in)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_SetMecaScalarFieldByNode

briefdescription.para: Update an external field on a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : poroMAILx_SetMecaScalarFieldByNode(IdBody, f_rank, f)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f_rank
(integer) : rank of the field to set
f
(double array) : value of the field
You need to set this field in your models.dat

memberdef.argsstring: (int IdBody, int f_rank, double *rvector_in, int rlength_in)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_SetTherScalarFieldByNode

briefdescription.para: Update an external field on a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : poroMAILx_SetTherieldByNode(IdBody, f_rank, f)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f_rank
(integer) : rank of the field to set
f
(double array) : value of the field
You need to set this field in your models.dat

memberdef.argsstring: (int IdBody, int f_rank, double *rvector_in, int rlength_in)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_SetMecaScalarFieldByElement

briefdescription.para: Update elementary scalar field through a element external field on a given body.

detaileddescription.para: Field values are stored at Gauss point, on an element all Gauss point have the element value
You need to declare this field in your MODELS.DAT

python usage : poroMAILx_SetMecaScalarFieldByElement(IdBody, f_rank, f)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f_rank
(integer) : rank of the field to set
f
(double array) : value of the field

memberdef.argsstring: (int IdBody, int f_rank, double *rvector_in, int rlength_in)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_SetTherScalarFieldByElement

briefdescription.para: Update elementary scalar field through a element external field on a given body.

detaileddescription.para: Field values are stored at Gauss point, on an element all Gauss point have the element value
You need to declare this field in your MODELS.DAT

python usage : poroMAILx_SetTherScalarFieldByElement(IdBody, f_rank, f)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f_rank
(integer) : rank of the field to set
f
(double array) : value of the field

briefdescription.para: Get the rank of field of an element of a body from its name.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : f_rank = poroMAILx_GetMecaScalarFieldRank(ibdyty, iblmty, name)
ibdyty
(integer) : id of the concern body
iblmty
(integer) : id of the concern element
name
(string) : name of the desired scalar field
f_rank (integer) : rank of the corresponding scalar field

briefdescription.para: Get the rank of field of an element of a body from its name.

detaileddescription.para:

(integer) : id of the concern body
iblmty

name
(string) : name of the desired vector field
f_rank (integer) : rank of the corresponding vector field

f_rank (integer) : rank of the corresponding scalar field

memberdef.argsstring: (int ibdyty, int f_rank, double *matrix_in, int dim1, int dim2)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_SetMecaVectorFieldByNode

briefdescription.para: Update elementary fields through a nodal external field on a given body.

detaileddescription.para: Use the form functions of the elements and input values to compute and store field values at Gauss points.
You need to declare this field in your MODELS.DAT

python usage : poroMAILx_SetFieldByNode(IdBody, f_rank, f)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f_rank
(integer) : rank of the vector field to set
f
(double array) : value of the vector field

briefdescription.para: Set a vector of a given body.

listitem.para: "Xbeg_": cumulated displacements over time at beginning of time step
"X____": cumulated displacements over time in computed configuration
"Vbeg_": velocity at beginning of time step
"VbALE": fluid velocity at beginning of time step
"V_ALE": fluid velocity at beginning of time step
"Pbeg_": pressure at beginning of time step

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : poroMAILx_PutBodyVector(datatype, ibdyty, matrix)
datatype
(string of size 5) : the vector to set
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of body
matrix
(double array) : the new values

briefdescription.para: computes the norm of the residue

memberdef.argsstring: (int ivalue1, double **matrix_out, int *dim1, int *dim2, int ivalue4=0)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_GetStress

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of a stress of a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
Python usage : stress = poroMAILx_GetStress(ibdyty,required_field=0)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
required_field
(integer) : required additional field
matrix_out (double 2D-array) : the desired stress

ibdyty

required_field

strain (double 2D-array) : the desired strain

briefdescription.para: ask for precomputation of the W matrix on support node dofs of contactors for all bodies. Assumes bulk behaviour is linear.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_ComputePreconW()

briefdescription.para: return node coordinates of idBody

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : array = poroMAILx_GetCoor(idBody)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concerned body
array (double 2D-array) : coordinates

briefdescription.para: return poro mechanical data computed for idBody

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : array = poroMAILx_GetAll(idBody)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concerned body
array (double 2D-array) : poro mechanical data

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of a grad P of a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
Python usage : grad = poroMAILx_GetGrad(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
grad (double 2D-array) : the desired grad

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of a Darcy Flux of a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
Python usage : flux = poroMAILx_GetFlux(ibdyty)
ibdyty
(integer) : rank of considered body
flux (double 2D-array) : the desired flux

briefdescription.para: return internal mechanical data computed for idBody

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : array = poroMAILx_GetInternal(idBody)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concerned body
array (double 2D-array) : mechanical internal data

briefdescription.para: return connectivity of idBody elements

python usage : vector = poroMAILx_GetConnectivity(idBody)
IdBody

IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f_dof
(integer) : dof of the concern node
f_node

f_value

briefdescription.para: Add elementary load through a nodal external field on a given body.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : poroMAILx_AddFieldLoad(IdBody, Ideriv, f)
IdBody
(integer) : id of the concern body
f

briefdescription.para: Write ascii DOF.OUT file. Can be activate only each N step.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_WriteOutDof()

briefdescription.para: load from MAILx and models for post

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_PostModels()

briefdescription.para: Free all memory allocated within poroMAILx module.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_CleanMemory()

briefdescription.para: check if model and material are matching ; set material parameter if external model

detaileddescription.para: python usage : poroMAILx_CheckProperties()

memberdef.argsstring: (char **string_vector, int *vector_size, int *string_size, int **i4_vector, int *i4_size, int **i4_vector_2, int *i4_size_2)
memberdef.name: poroMAILx_GetNbGpByElem

briefdescription.para: Get the list of finite elements for porox models and the associated number of Gauss Points for MECA and THER physics.

detaileddescription.para: Here memory is allocated within lmgc90 so that the pointer can be freely modified by third parties without nasty effect on lmgc90 functioning.

python usage : names, meca_nb, ther_nb = poroMAILx_GetNbGpByElem()
names (string list) : list of the finite elements meca_nb (integer list): list of the number of Gauss Points for MECA ther_nb (integer list): list of the number of Gauss Points for THER
